name: Unfinished Business (Ellie)
description:
A bitsy game about... the responsibility of having pets? What kind of emotional blackmail is this??

A simple Bitsy game that only requires arrow keys to function.

Fumble your way through the near-afterlife as you try to set up a trust fund for your cats. Not really, you just need someone to pet and feed them.

Made for the "ghost" Bitsy jam

My twitter: https://twitter.com/bideobames
